Text:
@Todek 
Hrmmm... The only thing I can find that is nearly close to a change log is steam updates and it seems piratebay disables Steam links...

From the official Steam forum:

- Various crash fixes based on user-submitted reports.

- Fix to typographical error in the Memorial Vigil, "The Skippers".
Great! I just installed these updates and wanted to play the game. Guess what, it deleted my saved Profile and now I have to start all over again.

The update seems to have worked fine. BUt does anybody know what all these updates are for?

The game has only been out a week or 2 and there are already so many updates?

Also, I went from 1.0r2 to this one. Is that fine? or did I have to update all the others in order?

@matthew_rs7 
Just like any other patch its meant to fix bugs... Oh and im pretty sure its a cumulative patch. (As in all previous bug-fixes are included)

@miguelsz3
Are you planning to upload the sixth patch?

@ummi1987
Hrmm? Well of course, as soon as I find it i'll upload it.

If you 'lost' your saves after updating, simply go to your saves folder, change the most recent save file (for me, it was B-NODE_ProtoTown03.sav), change it to Profile1.sav, and move it to the Swarm folder thats in the Bastion folder. Done deal. Save locations were changed.
can anyone upload the music, or is there anyway i could extract the music from the gamefiles?
The files are unorganized. Prevx and Ad-Aware flag it and won't let me open the files. Then when I let them open they do nothing. Virus or not this is a bad download.
